pages.text:
{title}

A tale of courage, curiosity, and a climb into the clouds.
pages.image_prompt_template: storybook illustration, full-bleed cover, {child_name} as Jack holding a small satchel, faint glowing beanstalk spiraling into clouds behind him, warm golden light, painterly Disney-Ghibli style, whimsical and adventurous, title '{title}' visible

pages.text:
At the edge of the market, {child_name} held out a tiny trinket.

"Trust me," the traveler whispered, pressing sparkling beans into {child_name}'s hand.
pages.image_prompt_template: storybook illustration, village market at golden hour, {child_name} centered holding glowing magic beans, mysterious traveler smiling gently, bustling stalls softly blurred, warm light, sense of choice and wonder

pages.text:
By morning, the ground cracked and groaned.

"Whoa…" gasped {child_name}, staring as a beanstalk climbed higher than the sky.
pages.image_prompt_template: low-angle wide shot, tiny cottage below, enormous beanstalk spiraling into misty clouds, leaves glowing softly, dawn light, epic scale, storybook illustration

pages.text:
Heart pounding, {child_name} wrapped both arms around the beanstalk.

"Up I go," {child_name} said, climbing into a world of clouds and sunlight.
pages.image_prompt_template: storybook illustration, vertical composition, {child_name} climbing thick beanstalk into luminous clouds, sky glowing pastel blues and golds, sense of bravery and wonder

pages.text:
A giant knelt carefully, making the ground tremble just a little.

"Hello, little climber," the giant said with a gentle smile.
pages.image_prompt_template: floating sky garden, gentle giant crouched at child’s eye level, oversized hands open and kind, flowers drifting in air, soft clouds, warm and safe mood

pages.text:
Between them shimmered a puzzle made of glowing stones.

"Let’s think together," said the giant, and {child_name} nodded.
pages.image_prompt_template: storybook illustration, glowing stone puzzle between child and giant, runes softly lit, thoughtful expressions, sky garden background, magical but calm

pages.text:
The puzzle clicked, and the garden began to rumble.

Laughing, they whooshed down the beanstalk as the wind rushed past their ears.
pages.image_prompt_template: dynamic diagonal composition, {child_name} and giant sliding down beanstalk, leaves whipping past, joyful expressions, bright sky, motion and excitement

pages.text:
"And then we slid all the way down!" {child_name} said, waving excited arms.

The villagers leaned closer, smiling wider with every word.
pages.image_prompt_template: village square at sunset, {child_name} animatedly telling a story, villagers gathered close, warm glowing lanterns, sense of amazement

pages.text:
"A giant? In the clouds?" someone asked.

{child_name} grinned. "The gentlest one you could ever meet."
pages.image_prompt_template: storybook illustration, cozy crowd scene, expressive faces lit by firelight, child storyteller centered

pages.text:
That night, cocoa steamed and stories grew taller.

"Best day ever," sighed {child_name}, curling up by the fire.
pages.image_prompt_template: home interior, crackling fire, mugs of cocoa, warm amber lighting, cozy storybook style

pages.text:
{child_name} stepped outside and looked up at the stars.

"Thank you," {child_name} whispered to the quiet sky.
pages.image_prompt_template: backyard at night, star-filled sky, child gazing upward, soft moonlight, peaceful and reflective mood

pages.text:
Curiosity had led {child_name} higher than ever before.

And from that day on, being brave felt a little easier.
pages.image_prompt_template: final storybook illustration, {child_name} standing confidently near small beanstalk sprout, sunrise light, hopeful ending, soft glow
